name: Scare your way back home
description:
You  are a ghost which wants to get it's home back. Your goal is to scare off the current inhabitant of the house in the forest named Leonardo. But be careful, when you touch the living too much, you will disintegrate . . !

This is a game which I tried to make within a game jam, which lasted 3 days. Unfortunately I didn't manage to finish the game, but upon working on it for a couple of more hours, I found that it felt more like a tech demo instead of a game, if that makes sense. The fun factor isn't really in the game, so I just finished a game loop and called it "done".
